attributes.action: Strip Irvine Patnick of his Knighthood
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned demand that the government strips Irvine Patnick not just of his knighthood and OBE - but any pension that he has picked up from the taxpayer since leaving Parliament in 1997.

This is due to the lies that he helped to spread in co-horts with the South Yorkshire Police and The Sun Newspaper in the aftermath of the Hillsborough Disaster on the 15th April 1989, as proven by the Hillsborough Independent Panel on the 12th September 2012.
